text: Nataliia Mikolaevna Kobzar (, 19 January 2000) is a Ukrainian . She won a gold and two silver medals at the Paralympic Games. == Career == Nataliia Mikolaevna Kobzar was born on 19 January 2000 in Kremenchuk, Ukraine. On 31 August 2021, she finished 2nd in the 400 metres event at the Paralympic Games in Tokyo. In 2024, she went to the Paralympic Games in Paris. There, on 30 August, she finished 2nd in the event. Then, on 3 September, she won the gold medal in the 400 meters event. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Ukraine Category:Paralympic silver medalists Category:Sprinters Category:Ukrainian athletes
title: Nataliia Kobzar
